content: Do you remember what my favorite color is?

I don’t have your favorite color recorded yet.

## TL;DR
- Tell me your favorite color, and I’ll remember it for next time.

## Want me to remember it?
- Reply with the color name (e.g., “deep green”) or a hex code (e.g., “#0F9D58”).
- If you have variations you prefer (light/dark, matte/neon), include that too.
